title: Could you help me recognise a font?
content:
Hello guys!  
Could you tell me which font is the one in this photo?  
Thank you very much

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [traduccionimagen.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110153755/http:/typophile.com/files/traduccionimagen.jpg) | 26.86 KB |
author: anasp8

comments.content: It depends. Can you ask in the [Type ID Forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110153755/http:/typophile.com/typeid)?
We can not help you here but you can try our Type ID link
